tool_description: Compares flight prices across multiple sources and identifies the best deals, price differences, and value recommendations.

flight_data_sources.description: Array of data source identifiers to compare

comparison_metric.description: Primary comparison factor: total_price, base_fare, price_per_hour, value_score

include_fees.description: Whether to include additional fees in price comparison

error_messages: Insufficient data sources: Provide at least 2 data sources for meaningful comparison.
Invalid comparison metric: Use one of [total_price, base_fare, price_per_hour, value_score].
Incompatible flight data: Flight data from sources cannot be compared due to different routes or dates.
Missing price information: Some sources lack complete pricing data for comparison.
usage: Provide flight_data_sources array with at least 2 source identifiers. Choose comparison_metric to determine ranking criteria. Set include_fees to control whether additional costs are factored in.

best_deal.description: Identifier of the source offering the best value

price_differences.description: Price differences between sources in ascending order

savings_potential.description: Maximum possible savings by choosing the best deal

recommendation.description: Detailed recommendation explaining the best choice
